Capstone Project - Betterflye Mobile

Betterflye is a social platform to track and measure your impact. Betterflye allows you and others to encourage more volunteering and donating, aiming to increase and recognize good actions.

My Capstone team created a cross platform mobile application with a microservice architecture using the Flutter development kit.

I worked on multiple parts of the project, mostly involving back-end logic, along with some front-end UI design. One such task I did was implementing a QR code scanner within the app.

Tech-Stack
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Flutter
  • Dart
